short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows word and characters count and some other info on any selected text (context menu).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Select any text and use context menu to show character, word count and other useful text statistics. Unlike other word count and text stats tools, it correctly counts not only Latin-based texts.
This extension is open-source software, feel free to contribute.
long.ru:
Select any text and use context menu to show character, word count and other useful text statistics. Additionally, on Evernote Web it constantly shows up-to-date, but shorter text stats.
Unlike other word count and text stats tools, it correctly counts not only Latin-based texts.
This extension is open-source software, feel free to contribute.
